payload.title: Create tests for LocalSync and deduplication
payload.description:
Tests para file watchers, debouncing, y deduplicación de eventos.

## Test Coverage

### LocalSync Tests (5 tests)
1. Watcher detecta file added
2. Watcher detecta file changed
3. Watcher detecta file removed
4. Debouncing 300ms funciona
5. Checksum validation antes de emitir

### EventBus Deduplication Tests (4 tests)
1. Duplicado en ventana 1s es ignorado
2. Evento después de 1s se emite
3. source field se preserva
4. recordId field se preserva

## Referencias

- local_sync.test.ts - Tests LocalSync
- event_bus.test.ts - Tests deduplication

## Target Coverage

>80% en ambos módulos

Tags: skill:jest, skill:testing
